page.title: 13Recreation
page.content: A recent survey showed that men in this area mainly spent their leisure time gardening, watching television, do-it-yourself, keeping fit and watching sport. The women like to read, watch television, sew or knit and keep fit. The boys had very varied and active pastimes including rugby, cricket, soccer, racquet sports, reading and television. The girls' main pastimes were reading, television, sewing, knitting and keeping fit. Some chose their pastimes through necessity (Keeping the garden tidy, growing food). Others to save money (D.I.Y., gardening, knitting, sewing), others to keep healthy and fit, but the main reasons were relaxation and enjoyment. The Leisure Centre proved an ideal venue for most of these pastimes.
